approve.description: Allows a spender to withdraw from the caller’s account up to the amount specified.

transfer.description: Transfers tokens directly from the caller’s address to another address.

transferFrom.description: Transfers tokens from one address to another on behalf of the sender.

constructor.description: Initializes the contract with existing holders, amounts, and various parameters.

acceptOwnership.description: Accepts ownership transfer from the pending owner.

setMinter.description: Sets the address allowed to mint new tokens.

mintInflation.description: Mints inflation tokens to a specified address.

mintOnce.description: Mints tokens to new holders in a single transaction.

transferOwnership.description: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new address.

decreaseAllowance.description: Decreases the allowance of a spender.

increaseAllowance.description: Increases the allowance of a spender.

INITIAL_SUPPLY_CAP.description: Returns the initial supply cap of the token.

WAD_ONE.description: Returns the WAD_ONE value used in calculations.

balanceOf.description: Returns the balance of a specified account.

allowance.description: Returns the amount of tokens that a spender is allowed to withdraw from the owner’s account.

currentPeriodEnd.description: Returns the end time of the current inflation cap period.

currentPeriodSupplyCap.description: Returns the supply cap for the current inflation period.

decimals.description: Returns the number of decimal places used for token values.

inflationCapPeriod.description: Returns the period for the inflation cap.

inflationCapWad.description: Returns the inflation cap in WAD units.

inflationUnlockTime.description: Returns the unlock time for inflation.

initialMintDone.description: Returns whether the initial minting has been completed.

minter.description: Returns the address authorized to mint new tokens.

name.description: Returns the name of the token.

symbol.description: Returns the symbol of the token.

totalSupply.description: Returns the total supply of the token.

owner.description: Returns the current owner of the contract.

pendingOwner.description: Returns the address of the pending owner for ownership transfer.

TokenUpdated.description: Emitted when the token parameters are updated.

TokensMinted.description: Emitted when tokens are minted to new holders.

InflationTokensMinted.description: Emitted when inflation tokens are minted.

Transfer.description: Emitted when tokens are transferred from one address to another.

Approval.description: Emitted when an approval is made for a spender to withdraw tokens.
